dct_title_s:
L'Afrique selon les nouvelles ob≈øervations de Messrs. de l'Academie de Sciences
          etc
dct_description_sm:
Reissued in 1729. Cartouche includes a nude woman sitting on a rectangle of masonry
        located in a rural scene with elephants, a lion and a snake. Legend states, "I would rather
        show this part of Africa as unknown and unihabited than rely on my imagination." Title
        across top, Africa in praecipuas ipsius partes distributa ...
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Dr. Oscar I. Norwich collection of maps of Africa and its islands, 1486 - ca. 1865 courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact the David Rumsey Map Center at rumseymapcenter@stanford.edu.
